words.def: one side of one leaf (of a book or magazine or newspaper or letter etc.) or the written or pictorial matter it contains
small cylindrical beads made from polished shells and fashioned into strings or belts
a conspicuous disparity or difference as between two figures
a wooden pin pushed or driven into a surface
any of various primates with short tails or no tail at all
seed of a pea plant used for food
an informal term for a father
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
